text:
I have been able to convert the deal owner from an ID to a name via 'deal.HubSpot_owner_id.fullname' in a workflow.

But can not work out what a similar snippet would be for the Deal Stage and Pipeline.
Can anyone help please

You can use the following snippet to get the deal stage and pipeline:

deal.properties.dealstage.value
deal.properties.pipeline.value

or the snippet you need to convert the deal stage and pipeline from an ID to a name is 'deal.pipeline.name' and 'deal.dealstage.name' respectively.

You can also do the syntax for accessing the Deal Stage and Pipeline from a HubSpot workflow would be 'deal.dealstage.label' and 'deal.pipeline.name' respectively.

Hey All!
Can anyone help me on how can I create a list in HubSpot to segment who has opened my email 2 times in the last 30 days? (both of these should be opened in the last 30 days)
